name: NinersNation - Simple International
description: A userstyle I wrote to simplify and delocalize www.ninersnation.com, intended for 49er fans around the world.
additional_info:
Version 1.0. 

Removed advertising and sponsors specific to the US, other Bay Area interests, other SBNation blogs, and all the social media advertising. Note you can still use the Twitter and Facebook integration, but the promos and adverts are gone. 

Future versions may have settings to allow selective removal.
